page.title: 09INDUSTRY and EMPLOYMENT 3
page.content:
There are a few other sources of emplyment in the area.In Napleton there is a small family haulage firm.In Green Street,there is a small riding stable.Baynhall has it's own garage,and it was there that the following interview was recorded.
BAYNHALL GARAGE When 3M went for the second time to Kempsey,Stephen Warburton and I interviewed the manager of Baynhall Garage.The manager is fifty three years old,married and has two children.He very much enjoys living in Kempsey,and the easy access this gives him to the large shops in Worcester.His pastime is his job because he very much enjoys it but does not have time for a true hobby.His wife also works at the garage.
